weAreHonored: We are honored to announce our special event -
thisEventStarts: This event starts now and will only be active during RLT Pre-Sale that lasts until November 20, 2019. Everyone making a contribution to RollerCoin can participate. All you need is to get to the TOP 100 Contributors list. Pre-Sale bonuses will be increased for the even, however, due to high demand we have to limit that amount of tokens allocated for Pre-Sale to leave some for the remaining faze of crowdfunding. So, long story short, let’s get straight to details and sweet prizes!
bonusToken: *Bonus tokens you get for purchases are also included in the count These Bonuses are exclusive for Pre-Sale stage and there will either be no bonuses during the next stage or they will be significantly lower.
theMaximumAmount: The maximum amount allocated for Pre-Sale. P.S. Some of it has already been sold
playersWhoDont: Players who don’t get a lucky lottery ticket will get one of the NEW Miners free of charge. Yes, the new line of miners is almost ready and will be released during the next stage of crowdfunding.The Contest is over when either the time runs out or
